data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 348,847 believers in the county of Huizhou to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Huizhou, Guangdong, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Huizhou, Guangdong, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Huizhou, Guangdong, China.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Huizhou, Guangdong, China a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Nepalese people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, you desire the people in the county of Huizhou who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Huizhou with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Huizhou, Guangdong, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

location.name: Huizhou
location.people_groups_list: Deaf, Indonesian, Thai, Jew, French-speaking, Malay
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Deaf (15,000), Indonesian (134,000), Thai (11,000), Jew, French-speaking (800), Malay (15,000)
